message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,400,000. It's a fantastic deal, and I believe it's worth every penny. Let me know your thoughts.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,200,000. I believe that's a fair price considering the market value of the product.
Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but I'm still not quite there.  I'm willing to go down to $1,300,000.  Let's meet in the middle and close this deal.
I understand you're willing to meet in the middle, but I'm still a bit too far apart. I'm willing to go to $1,250,000, but that's my final offer. I hope we can come to an agreement.
